Lebowski.TextModel.ITextContext

Lebowski.TextModel.ITextContext Interface Reference

A text context, that contains the state of a collaboratively shared document. More...

Inheritance diagram for Lebowski.TextModel.ITextContext:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

void Delete (object issuer, DeleteOperation operation)
 Performs a deletion operation on the context.
void Insert (object issuer, InsertOperation operation)
 Performs a insertion operation on the context.
void Invoke (Action action)
 Invokes the given action in a thread that has read-write access to this context. If you are not operating on e.g. a UI control, you can just implement this method by calling the delegate directly.
void Refresh ()
 Refreshes the context, making sure that changes are correctly reflected in any UI associated with it.
void SetRemoteSelection (object siteIdentifier, int start, int end)
 Sets the remote selection of the user identified by siteIdentifier. Some text context implementations might support displaying those remote selections to achieve better interaction awareness.
void SetSelection (int start, int last)
 Sets the local selection.

 Gets or sets the position of the local caret within the document.

 The data (text) that makes up the document.
bool HasSelection [get]
 Returns true when the there currently is a selection.
string SelectedText [get]
 Gets the text currently selected.
int SelectionEnd [get]
 Returns the index of the first character that is not part of the selection.
int SelectionStart [get]
 Returns the index of the first character that is part of the selection.

Events

EventHandler< ChangeEventArgs > Changed
 Occurs when the context has been changed.
EventHandler< DeleteEventArgs > Deleted
 Occurs when an DeleteOperation has been performed.
EventHandler< InsertEventArgs > Inserted
 Occurs when an InsertOperation has been performed.

Detailed Description

A text context, that contains the state of a collaboratively shared document.

void Lebowski.TextModel.ITextContext.SetRemoteSelection ( object  siteIdentifier,
int  start,
int  end 
)

Sets the remote selection of the user identified by siteIdentifier. Some text context implementations might support displaying those remote selections to achieve better interaction awareness.

Parameters:
siteIdentifier A identifier that uniquely describes the remote site in the current session
start Start of the selection
end End of the selection

Implemented in Lebowski.TextModel.AbstractTextContext, Lebowski.TextModel.StringTextContext, Lebowski.TextModel.TextBoxTextContext, and Lebowski.TextModel.TextEditorTextContext.

void Lebowski.TextModel.ITextContext.SetSelection ( int  start,
int  last 
)

Sets the local selection.

Parameters:
start The index of the first character that should be selected.
last The index after the last character that should be selected.

Implemented in Lebowski.TextModel.AbstractTextContext, Lebowski.TextModel.StringTextContext, Lebowski.TextModel.TextBoxTextContext, and Lebowski.TextModel.TextEditorTextContext.
